Enums/Auth/Scope.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.abstract: Read a user’s relationship information with other users.

Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.name: clientIdNotSet
Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.abstract: Occurs when Auth.client_id is nil when attempting to use Auth.url.

Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.name: clientSecretNotSet
Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.abstract: Occurs when Auth.client_secret is nil when attempting to use Auth.url.

Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.name: contextLost
Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.abstract: Occurs if the client id or secret are nil upon returing from Pinterest login. This should be rare.

Enums/Auth/Error.html#/s:13PinterestAuth.abstract: Occurs if the client id or secret contain unexpected characters.
